exceptions.exn: In environment p, k : nat f : R -> R -> R x, y : R H : locally_2d (ex_diff_n f (p + S k)) x y Unable to unify "Derive ?M2363 ?M2365 = Derive ?M2364 ?M2365" with "Derive (fun v : R => Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => f t z) k v) p x) y = Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => f t z) (S k) y) p x".
